ComicInfo.Summary: Advent Part 2: Sara and Patrick investigate another murder where the victim was flayed and crucified in the manner of a Catholic saint. Sara returns home to find Dani, her babysitter for the day, unconscious on the bed and her new boyfriend, David, in possession of her half of the Witchblade.
